library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(janitor)
library(waffle)
library(viridis)
library(gtools)
library(ggpubr)
library(kableExtra)

set.seed(21234)

options(ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis")

cb_palette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7")
  
options(ggplot2.discrete.colour = cb_palette,
        ggplot2.discrete.fill = cb_palette)
